newsitem.title: UK: HORSE RACING-BENNY THE DIP WINS PHOTO-FINISH DERBY.
newsitem.headline: HORSE RACING-BENNY THE DIP WINS PHOTO-FINISH DERBY.

text.p: Benny The Dip, an 11-1 chance ridden by Willie Ryan, won the Epsom Derby horse racing classic on Saturday in an exciting photo finish with Silver Patriarch, the mount of Pat Eddery.
Benny The Dip scored by a short head from the fast finishing 6-1 second favourite. The pair were five lengths clear of 25-1 outsider Romanov, partnered by John Reid.
The big disappointment was the 6-4 on favourite Entrepreneur, the mount of Michael Kinane, who won the 2,000 Guineas earlier in the season.
Entrepreneur never got in a blow and finished a well beaten fourth of the 13 runners.
Benny The Dip, trained by John Gosden at Newmarket, won $970,000 for owner Landon Knight.
